musicalLanguage.description: A bright, uplifting piece built on simple arpeggiated patterns that evoke sunlight gradually filling a room. The harmony moves gently through diatonic chords in G major, creating warmth and optimism.
teachingGoals: Practice basic arpeggio patterns across both hands
Learn to create a sense of musical growth and direction
styleTips: Gradually grow from very soft to moderately warm
Each arpeggio should flow smoothly into the next
